titleStmt.title: The way to prosperity a sermon / preached to the honourable convention of the governour, council, and representatives of the Massachuset-Colony in New-England on May 23, 1690 by Cotton Mather.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Pierce for Benjamin Harris,
